Text: belated hello and sorry for not calling you backMonique I really wanted to spend some time talking with you this past weekend but with the bachelor party I was involved with it was impossible to fit it in And the fact of the matter is Im sorry on a number of levels The most obvious is that I simply enjoy spending time with youalways fun and you always have intelligent things to say At a different level I think you have a very level head and are great at giving advice and I value you what you have to say about relationships something I dont think Im very good at yet And finally and at the deepest level I want to hear what is happening in your life and how you are doing I know there are things going on in your head about career relationships etc and Id love to hear about it and hopefully provide some sort of insight help You know I have always had a soft spot in my heart for you and in a strange way I cheer you for your successes and I am sad for you when you are troubledIll stop there because this just doesnt come across well through email Maybe we could grab a beer on Friday afternoon like last time at the Ale House Ill be in town Let me know if you are available respond by email when you can Hope all is well and Ill talk to you soon joe Joseph F Reid Accenture W C This message is for the designated recipient only and may contain privileged or confidential information If you have received it in error please notify the sender immediately and delete the original Any other use of the email by you is prohibited

yesi liveMonique Sorry I havent gotten back to you before now and I truly wish we couldve gotten together over Memorial Day I was only in town a couple of days and then off to San Antonio so we just missed each other again Go a lot to catch up on and I am going to be tenacious in my attempts to get a hold of youlet me know when you have time to talk I am out this weekend but maybe tonight or next week we can chat Let me know Take care and stay safe joe This message is for the designated recipient only and may contain privileged or confidential information If you have received it in error please notify the sender immediately and delete the original Any other use of the email by you is prohibited

RE yesi liveI cant believe the amount of travel you fit into your schedulei am impressed Ill try calling you next week before you go joe Joseph F Reid Accenture W C om To cc AM Subject RE yesi live Hey there I am actually off to Alaska on sunday with john and am gone until the thso maybe you can call me before then Take care Mo Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJosephEFEReidaccentureEcom NRONcom Sent Thursday June AM To Sanchez Monique Subject yesi live Monique Sorry I havent gotten back to you before now and I truly wish we couldve gotten together over Memorial Day I was only in town a couple of days and then off to San Antonio so we just missed each other again Go a lot to catch up on and I am going to be tenacious in my attempts to get a hold of youlet me know when you have time to talk I am out this weekend but maybe tonight or next week we can chat Let me know Take care and stay safe joe This message is for the designated recipient only and may contain privileged or confidential information If you have received it in error please notify the sender immediately and delete the original Any other use of the email by you is prohibited This message is for the designated recipient only and may contain privileged or confidential information If you have received it in error please notify the sender immediately and delete the original Any other use of the email by you is prohibited
